discourse_list.title: [Learn] Requirements & How to claim your 400 UNI

content.content: Since this question is being asked a lot, if your address in ineligible to receive the 400 UNI airdrop, then you didn’t meet the requirement. The requirement was simple: The snapshot for this airdrop was held on September 1, 2020, at 12:00 am UTC. Anyone who hasn’t used Uniswap before this snapshot is not eligible for the airdrop.  How to claim the UNI You can easily claim your UNI tokens in just a few steps:  Visit the one of the Uniswap trading pages (ETH/USDT example). Connect your ETH wallet. If your wallet is eligible you will see a popup in the Uniswap app (top right corner). Click on “Claim your tokens” and approve the transaction. Don’t forget to set the right gas limit (https://ethgasstation.info/). Currently gas fees are high, myself I used 90,000 gas and 800 GWEI.  That’s it!  More info:  60% of the UNI genesis supply is allocated to Uniswap community members, a quarter of which (15% of total supply) has already been distributed to past users  Token Allocation:  60.00% to Uniswap community members [600,000,000 UNI] 21.51% to team members and future employees with 4-year vesting [215,101,000 UNI] 17.80% to investors with 4-year vesting [178,000,000 UNI] .069% to advisors with 4-year vesting [6,899,000 UNI]  Claiming the airdrop:   15% of UNI  [150,000,000 UNI]  can immediately be claimed by  historical liquidity providers, users, and SOCKS redeemers/holders  based on a snapshot endingSeptember 1, 2020, at 12:00 am UTC.   49 million UNI  are claimable by historical liquidity providers. The formula accounts for LP liquidity on a per-second basis since the deployment of Uniswap v1, ensuring that rewards are weighted towards LPs that provided liquidity when total liquidity was low.   400 UNI are claimable by each address that has ever called the Uniswap v1 or v2 contracts. This includes  ~12,000  addresses that have only ever submitted failed transactions — love you guys.   Have a great day & thanks a lot to the Uniswap team!
Will be there any new airdrop in future?

I’m not a team member, but their blog reads: ‘’ With 15%  of tokens already available to be claimed by historical users and liquidity providers, the governance treasury will retain 43% [430,000,000 UNI] of UNI supply to distribute on an ongoing basis through contributor grants, community initiatives, liquidity mining  , and other programs.’’ That being said, there are ways in which you’ll be able to earn more UNI. I don’t know if that’d include another airdrop though. But, one thing is for certain, you’ll be able to earn through liquidity mining. ''An initial liquidity mining program will go live September 18 2020 12:00am UTC. The initial program will run until November 17 2020 12:00am UTC and target the following four pools on Uniswap v2: * *ETH/USDT  ETH/USDC ETH/DAI ETH/WBTC  5,000,000 UNI will be allocated per pool to LPs proportional to liquidity, which roughly translates to:  83,333.33 UNI per pool per day 54 UNI per pool per block
Yes, there are 60% allocation of the total supply for the community, Initially it distributes only 15% of the community allocation. Therefore, future there may be another reward programs
Merci et si je veux l’avoir maintenant comment je fais ça svp
Je vais modifier le message pour vous dire comment cela fonctionne.
I prefer mining it to buying… but pls is there any link to put me through the mining process @TMod_Marco ?

https://uniswap.org/blog/uni/ <<< Under ** Liquidity Mining**. The initial liquidity mining program will go live September 18 2020 12:00am UTC. You simply provide liquidity to ETH/USDT, ETH/USDC, ETH/DAI, ETH/WBTC (these are the current eligible pools).
@TMod_Marco thanks, I’ll go through it now

Manually Claiming UNI Merkle Distribution If, for whatever reason, you are unable to claim UNI tokens distributed as part of the Merkle distribution through an interface such as app.uniswap.org, the following steps may be taken to manually claim tokens for an address:  Install jq  Search the public Merkle tree blob for your address with the following command:  curl https://ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmegj6pV3qvGE8XWfMPdzXCu2sUoNMGtpbL5vYuAkhnJja | jq '.claims."YOUR_ADDRESS_HERE"' Note that your address must be properly checksummed. The Merkle tree blob is also available at https://mrkl.uniswap.org. If you’ve already downloaded the Merkle tree separately, you may search it via: cat FILENAME.json | jq '.claims."YOUR_ADDRESS_HERE"'  Navigate to the MerkleDistributor contract on Etherscan and input the data from above into the relevant fields. The page should look something like:  Screen Shot 2020-09-17 at 12.47.34 PM1220×401 23.1 KB Note that the merkleProof arguments must be wrapped in brackets, comma-separated, and not contain any spaces.

So I do got the 400 UNI tokens but in dollars/euros much lower. Why is that?

Since I’ve seen a lot of people asking how to redeem their UNI tokens which they’ve earned with Argent, so I thought it might be useful for some if I shared our guide which we have made on redeeming UNI using Argent: https://www.argent.xyz/blog/uni-tokens/ If anyone has any issues at all, please reach out to us on our Discord and we’ll try our best to help you: https://discordapp.com/invite/GWSyrHg

TrustWallet: 0x07147DEc22E4693cA4444a902A5a0348E7C1eF8E i don’t know why this is issue occurs to me , but i love to get those Uni tokens. it is quite painful to see that you are eligible but can not claime it for a technical issue Could you please help me, many thanks

If you are having technical issues with claiming your tokens, please do not post about it in this forum. This forum is for discussion of Governance related matters. For support questions, please visit the support channel of our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/XErMcTq We are experiencing a lot of support requests right now, so please be patient. Also, if you are having an issue, chances are someone else in the discord is having the same issue, so maybe hang out in the support channel for a little bit and most likely your question will be answered. Welcome to the community, everyone!
Great explanation @TMod_Marco  The airdrop is done, let’s support Uniswap and change the world together

Hi Tariq, Drop & Replaced means you’ve most likely tried to speed up the transaction, am I right? Transaction speed depends on the amount of GWEI & GAS you used. Etherscan should give you insights in how long the transaction will be pending. Personally I used 800 GWEI & 90,000 GAS and it went through fairly quickly. If you need to cancel your transaction because it’d be pending too long, you can send 0 ETH to yourself with e.g. 600 GAS to cancel the transaction (I did so myself as I had this ‘issue’, check out this post for instructions). Also, please use: https://discord.com/invite/XErMcTq

I received 400 uni, but I have not received 1000 from the results of wearing socks

The 49M UNI claimable includes the 400 UNI ‘airdrop’. It’s nothing separately, you’d be able to claim the amount of UNI your account is eligible for. E.g. more if you provided liquidity for a while or owned / redeemed SOCKS at time of the snapshot.   That discussion has been going on. Snapshot has happened, eligible addresses can claim and that’s it.

I have 800 UNI sitting out on EitherscanIO  I see them sitting there, but I do not know how to get them into my wallet.  The wallet address wasn’t in my ledger so they did not go there.  I don’t know how to get them out and into a wallet.  Can anyone help me please? Barb Hauxwell

Hi Barb, Best you join the Discord channel for support. T.b.h. if they’re visible in your wallet on Etherscan, they should be in your wallet. You might just have to add UNI as a custom token if it doesn’t show up (idk which wallet you use). If it’s ledger, then you’re best off accessing them via myetherwallet.com. https://discord.gg/sbPFmQ

Another alternative to see the tokens sitting on your Ledger device which would be similar to Marco’s suggestion would be to download Metamask and connect your Ledger device to Metamask. You would then need to add the Uni token to Metamask which can be done by copying the UNI token address into the token address box found after pressing the “Add Token” button in Metamask, after you enter this it should then automatically detect the decimal and token name automatically. Press ok and you should be good to go and be able to see your tokens on your Ledger via Metamask. Hope this helps and apologies for so many edits (perfectionist in me making slight corrections again and again)

You can check your address against this master list. …httpsraw.githubusercontent.com/banteg/uniswap-distribution/master/uniswap-distribution.csv… You will need to add a : and 2 // between https and raw PLUS remove the elipsis … from each end, because it woudn’t allow me to post a link. Regards
Hello Sir, I just want to ask if until when is the claiming of UNI ends?

Think admins will advise you to move this to the Uniswap Discord as your second question is more of a support question than governance question. In response to your first question as far as I’m aware for existing Airdrop qualifiers there is no limit the claim time is unlimited so long as your claim was before the 1st as outlined here and in line with the original airdrop terms. Again this can all be verified on their Discord

Again this is a Governance board not a General Forum support requests are more appropriate for the uniswap discord. Also Uniswap do not have any other channels to claim the airdrops through, all claims are done through app.uniswap.org only beware and be careful of scams

After consideration, I have decided to lock my own topic. Reason being: there are too many support requests which simply don’t belong to the governance forum. And, it’s time to move on to actual governance rather than being a help channel for users to claim their airdrop.  The guide is there, if it shows 0 UNI - you’re simply ineligible. At this moment there is no plan to have another airdrop Never share your private keys with anyone. App.uniswap.org is indeed the only place to claim the airdrop.  Thank you for the amazing support on this thread. For actual account support, join the Discord: https://discord.gg/EWE9ACU
